attributes.action: Products with vegan on the label  must adhere to vegan ethics
attributes.additional_details: Garnier is an example of a company misleading consumers with advertising vegan products with a slight addition to the vegan description so the product isn't vegan at all.
attributes.background: Many people buy gifts for vegans and don't understand all the loopholes companies use to mislead people, if vegan is mentioned on a label it should adhere to the vegan philosophy. Using vegan formula when product isn't vegan is false labelling and too misleading.
